dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark suite for various tasks in autonomous driving, including 3D object detection, with a focus on real-world scenarios. It contains 7,481 training samples and 7,518 test samples, categorized into different difficulty levels based on object size, occlusion, and truncation.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Mao
M. Niu
C. Jiang
H. Liang
J. Chen
X. Liang
Y. Li
C. Ye
W. Zhang
Z. Li
dcterms:description: The ONCE dataset consists of one million scenes for autonomous driving, providing a large-scale dataset for training and evaluating 3D object detection models in various environments.
dcterms:title: ONCE Dataset
